input.sentences: [female] took her first trip to location with her best friend .
they walked along the river and had to stay bundled up because it was cold .
the architecture was interesting and very different from other places she had seen .
[female] and her friend goofed around and took photos all day .
[female] plans on going back to location the next chance she gets .
output.sentences: I recently went on a trip to Canada to see a friend.
She showed me her favorite locations to hang out.
We event went to historical sites, which was pretty cool.
It was really beautiful outside, with the sun shining on us.
I hope to visit my friend in Canada again.
